artist: Painter: After Prospero Fontana; Delineator: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Guilio Tomba
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate lower left in black: [Prosper Fontana/ faceibat]; below image in black:: [P. Fontana dip.  F. Rosaspina dis. G Tomba inc./ JESU CHRISTO POSTO NEL SEPOLCRO];  on sheet  lower left in pencil: [1-417]
life_date: After Prospero Fontana, Painter, 1512–1597; Francesco Rosaspina, Delineator, Italian, 1762–c.1841; Guilio Tomba, Engraver, Italian, 1780–1840
title: Jesu Christo Posto Nel Sepolcro
